user_request: Clear the cart on walmart. Add usb-b to the cart on walmart
reflect_result:
By scrolling up, the view of the Walmart shopping page was shifted, revealing a new set of products related to the "usb-b" search. The products on the screen have changed, now showing a USB-C to USB-A adapter, priced at $6.99.

This action helped to progress towards the user's request, as it has exposed additional products that could potentially be added to the cart. However, the user still needs to select a product and explicitly add it to the cart. Therefore, while the action was necessary to see more options, it has not fully completed the user request yet. The next step is to select a product and add it to the cart.
